casebody.data:
Farmers and Mechanics Bank v. John T. O’Reilly et al. (12905)

Dupont, C. J., and Foti and Lavery, Js.

Argued September 13 decision released October 4, 1994 John T. O'Reilly, pro se, the appellant (named defendant). Theodore V. Raczka, with whom, on the brief, was Nancy Bazan, legal intern, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed and the case is remanded for the purpose of setting new law days.
